algorithm_technique: Prefix and suffix GCD/LCM calculation for efficient subarray analysis.
problem_summary_simple: Find the max factor score (GCD*LCM) of an array after removing at most one element.
problem_summary_technical: Use prefix/suffix arrays for GCD and LCM. Iterate through removals, combining prefix and suffix GCD/LCM to find max factor score.
key_insights: The core idea is to efficiently calculate GCD and LCM for subarrays.
Prefix and suffix arrays for GCD and LCM allow O(1) lookup for any subarray's GCD/LCM after O(n log r) preprocessing.
Removing an element splits the array into two parts, whose GCD/LCM can be combined using the precomputed prefix/suffix values.
